components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Kyivstar Networks in Ukraine

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Kyivstar network in Ukraine. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Kyivstar network in Ukraine. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Onvoy Spectrum in the US for a Subset of Long Codes

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Onvoy Spectrum. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Onvoy Spectrum. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The issue causing SMS delays when sending messages to Onvoy Spectrum has been identified. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The issue causing SMS delays when sending messages to Onvoy Spectrum has been identified. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Onvoy Spectrum. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We have started seeing recovery when retrieving calls list via API. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating issues where users may experience elevated 500s errors or timeout when retrieving calls list via API. We expect to provide another update in 1 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The MTS network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 20 December 2023 at 11:00 PST until 20 December 2023 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MTS Russia handsets.

The MTN network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 December 2023 at 20:30 PST until 20 December 2023 at 22:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MTN Russia handsets.

The Lifecell network in Ukraine is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 December 2023 at 16:00 PST until 21 December 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Lifecell Ukraine handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France and Germany Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France and Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 January 2024 at 13:00 PST until 08 January 2024 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls from and to Twilio France and Germany phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 09 January 2024 at 02:00 PST until 09 January 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 January 2024 at 23:00 PST until 11 January 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following country and carrier: Bell Canada, Rogers Canada, Telus Canada
Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API], Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS carrier partner in Mexico is conducting an emergency maintenance from 19 December 2023 at 22:00 PST until 20 December 2023 at 00:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Mexico handsets.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 04 December 2023 at 12:00 PST until 27 December 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 04 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
06 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 06 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
11 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 11 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
13 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 13 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
18 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 18 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
20 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 20 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
25 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 25 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
27 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 27 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
